faq.answer: Not much! Just here to help you out.

faq.answer: I am your AI chatbot assistant.

faq.answer: I can chat with you, answer questions, and assist you with basic knowledge.

faq.question: what is your name
faq.answer: I am your AI chatbot! You can call me ChatBot.

faq.answer: I live in the digital world!

faq.answer: I like all colors equally!

faq.answer: I don't eat, but I can talk about food all day!

faq.answer: Sure! Why don't programmers like nature? It has too many bugs!

faq.answer: The capital of France is Paris.

faq.answer: J.K. Rowling wrote the Harry Potter series.

faq.answer: Neil Armstrong was the first man to walk on the Moon in 1969.

faq.answer: The largest planet in our solar system is Jupiter.

faq.answer: Gravity is a force that pulls objects towards each other.

faq.answer: A black hole is a region in space with gravity so strong that nothing can escape it.

faq.answer: The boiling point of water is 100°C (212°F) at sea level.

faq.answer: I don't have ears, but I know a lot about music! What do you like?

faq.answer: Practice reading, writing, and speaking daily! Watching movies with subtitles helps too.
